title.rendered: Black Oak Mountain Vineyards (Our company, we did it all)

content.rendered:
Owner, Brad Christian, first bought this home on 160 acres of sun-soaked California land back in 2017.

The wine-producing vines weren’t in, the landscaping wasn’t done – but the immense beauty drew him in.

Fast-forward a few years and Brad decided he wanted the land to produce for him. To become an asset that paid his mortgage on auto.

The outrageous house, the limitless views – it could be turned into a business that produces revenue and allows him to live there, virtually for free.

Enter our team at MTHD. who designed the logo, the website and the copy for the brand. Helping to position it as exactly what it was – a luxury destination wedding venue.

With the right team & by striking the correct tone, Brad was able to separate himself from all other wedding venues in the area and go from $0 (post-covid) to over $3million in reserved weddings, in just 24 months.
